skyux_dropdown_context_menu_default_labe._description: The label on the context menu button used for screen readers when the consumer has not specified a label

skyux_dropdown_context_menu_with_content._description: The label on the context menu button used for screen readers when the consumer has not specified a label and the component has content descriptor text provided
The label on the context menu button used for screen readers when the consumer has not specified a label and the component has a content descriptor element id provided
